questions.quote: Well, if we're all set to go, why don't you two hop aboard and let me show you a little taste of old New York...the way it once was. Oh, happy anniversary. On, Rusty!
Oh. Well listen, I almost forgot to ask you. What happened at the funeral? Now, did you talk to Alec berg?
No, I-I-I know... [retreats back to his Chinese take out] I know...
You heard me. So he packed it up and split for the coast. La-La Land. L.A.
I don't give out bites. I got another one. But I'm saving it for later.
What about over there? You know air conditioners fall out all the time.
That's a tough minute. It's like waiting in the shower for the conditioner to work.
Well, I told him the whole story and he just let me have it. Wha -- Yeah. He's a wonderful man.
